vaqpack.data

Class VP_FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • vaqpack.data.VP_FileManager

  • public class VP_FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages anything related to files, such as saving or reading the HTML files and saving PDF files.
    Since:
    1.0
